docs.snippet: Movements of the Argentina peso and Canadian free dollar continued to interest traders in the foreign exchange market last week. The Latin currency shot up to 25.25 cents, unmatched since October, 1938, while the Dominion unit at 90.44 cents,...
docs.lead_paragraph: Movements of the Argentina peso and Canadian free dollar continued to interest traders in the foreign exchange market last week. The Latin currency shot up to 25.25 cents, unmatched since October, 1938, while the Dominion unit at 90.44 cents, retouched the year's highest made last March.

headline.main: FOREIGN EXCHANGE RATES; WEEK ENDED APRIL 24, 1943

byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, April 27 (AP) -- The Uruguayan Cabinet gave final approval today to a $20,000,000 loan negotiated in January by Vice President Alberto Guani with the Export-Import Bank of Washington for a public works program in Uruguay.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, April 27 (AP) -- The Uruguayan Cabinet gave final approval today to a $20,000,000 loan negotiated in January by Vice President Alberto Guani with the Export-Import Bank of Washington for a public works program in Uruguay.
docs.abstract: Cabinet ratifies Export-Import Bank loan; Pres Amezaga urges econ control system similar to that of pre-war France

headline.main: URUGUAY RATIFIES LOAN; Cabinet Backs $20,000,000 Deal With Export-Import Bank

docs.snippet: THREE trained workers of the Y.W.C.A. are Africa-bound to help in recreation problems of women in uniform behind the Allied lines. They add another continent to the activities of the organization's World Emergency and War Victims Fund.
docs.lead_paragraph: THREE trained workers of the Y.W.C.A. are Africa-bound to help in recreation problems of women in uniform behind the Allied lines. They add another continent to the activities of the organization's World Emergency and War Victims Fund.

headline.main: A WOMAN'S WAR, TOO; Y.W.C.A. Workers on Way to Africa to Aid In Recreation for Women in Uniform

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, May 11 (AP) -- All forty-three governments invited to participate in the United Nations Food Conference opening at Hot Springs. Va., next Tuesday have now accepted, it was learned at the State Department today.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, May 11 (AP) -- All forty-three governments invited to participate in the United Nations Food Conference opening at Hot Springs. Va., next Tuesday have now accepted, it was learned at the State Department today.

headline.main: 43 NATIONS ACCEPT BID TO FOOD PARLEY; Representatives to Take Part in Hot Springs Session Tuesday
